channel.title: Pods – Cloud Chemistry
channel.description: Premium eLiquid Custom Handmade to Order™

item.title: Nord 2 Pod
item.dc:creator: Matteo Laki
item.description: Compatible with SMOK Nord 2 Kit, It comes in two variants: RPM Pod & Nord pod
item.content:encoded:
SMOK Nord 2 Empty Replacement Pod Cartridge is compatible with  SMOK Nord 2 Kit. It comes in two variants: RPM Pod & Nord pod. It comes with the E-Juice capacity of 4.5ml.

Product Highlight

  • RPM Pod
  • Nord Pod
  • 4.5ml E-Juice Capacity
  • Compatible Device  : Smok Nord 2 Kit

Package Content

  • 1x SMOK Nord 2 Empty Replacement Pod Cartridge (Coil not included)

item.title: RPM80 RPM POD
item.dc:creator: Matteo Laki
item.description: Designed for SMOK RPM 80 Kit! Choose RPM Pod or RGC Pod. (Coil sold separately)
item.content:encoded:
SMOK RPM 80 Replacement Pod Cartridge 

SMOK RPM 80 Replacement Pod Cartridge is designed for SMOK RPM 80 Kit, which has a capacity of 5ml e-Liquid. It has an adjustable airflow ring at the bottom that can be rotated to adjust the air input.

It is compatible with all RPM40 coils to maximize coil compatibility and meet diverse vaping needs.

On the other hand, the RPM80 RGC Pod matches a new RGC conical mesh coil, to provide better steam generation and flavor.

Product Highlight

  • Side Refill System – Silicone Stoppered
  • 5mL Refillable RPM80 Pod
  • Plug ‘n’ Play Coil Installation
  • Observable capacity, easy to monitor at any time
  • Bottom adjustable airflow

Package Contents:

  • 1x SMOK RPM 80 Replacement Pod Cartridge

item.title: Joyetech Penguin Pod
item.dc:creator: James
item.content:encoded:
The Joyetech ATOPACK Penguin Replacement Cartridge promises 100% in authenticity, performance and power! The ATOPACK Penguin Cartridge is occupied with a refillable 8.8mL pod and a replaceable coil unit, which makes room for convenient switching between flavors.

The Joyetech ATOPACK Penguin Replacement Cartridge is compatible with the Joyetech ATOPACK Penguin and the Joyetech ATOPACK Penguin SE.

Cartridge Features:

  • Capacity: 8.8ml
  • Includes Top and Bottom Seals
  • Writing Space
  • Built-in 8mm x 6mm Bore Drip Tip
  • Nonadjustable 7mm x 3mm Air slot
  • Rinse and Reuse

Package Contents:

  • 1x Joyetech ATOPACK Penguin Replacement Cartridge (Empty Pod)

NOTE: *PLEASE READ PRIOR TO USE OF CARTRIDGE*

Before using the cartridge for the first time, fill it to its maximum e-Liquid limit, as indicated by the original manufacturer of the cartridge. Wait about 5 minutes for the “priming process” to take place, in which the cotton of the coil soaks-up the e-Liquid.

Please note that each cartridge and coil is different and should be treated as such.

item.title: Nautilus AIO Pod
item.dc:creator: James
item.content:encoded:
The Aspire Nautilus AiO Cartridge is designed for the Aspire Nautilus AiO Pod Kit. The Nautilus AiO replacement pod has a massive 4.5ml E-liquid capacity with easy bottom refill with a effective silicone plug in the base of the pod. And the Aspire Nautilus AiO mainly features the Aspire’s Nautilus BVC coil for great flavor. Together with the adjustable airflow system, the Aspire Nautilus can suit your different vaping preference.

Pod Features:

  • Capacity: 4.5ml
  • Fill: Bottom filling system

Package Contents:

  • 1x Aspire Nautilus Pod Cartridge 4.5ml
  • 1x 1.8ohm Nautilus BVC Coil
  • 1x Spare Parts

NOTE: ** PLEASE READ PRIOR TO USE OF CARTRIDGE

Before using the cartridge for the first time, fill it to its maximum e-Liquid limit, as indicated by the original manufacturer of the cartridge. Wait about 4-8 minutes for the “priming process” to take place, in which the cotton of the coil soaks-up the e-Liquid. 

Once the cotton has been sufficiently saturated by the liquid, it is safe to fire your device without the risk of burning the coil. If there is a “burnt” taste once vaping begins, do not keep firing!

Please note that each cartridge and coil is different and should be treated as such.

item.title: Boulder Rock Pod
item.dc:creator: James
item.content:encoded:
Boulder Rock Pod Refillable pods make vaping extremely convenient! Simply fill the pods beforehand and switch to a new flavor or a full pod in seconds anytime.

Compatible with:

  • Boulder Rock Pod System

You Will Receive:

  • 1x – Boulder Rock 1.5mL Refillable Pod

item.title: Smok Nord Pod (with coils)
item.dc:creator: James
item.content:encoded:
The Nord Pod from SmokTech is specially designed for the Nord Pod Kit. It comes with 3mL capacity with easy side filling system. The package includes two Nord Coils: Nord 0.6 ohm mesh coil and 1.4 ohm regular coil. The 0.6 ohm mesh coil is designed for sub-ohm vaping for faster heating and massive clouds. And the 1.4 ohm regular coil is designed for MTL vaping, which can help you enjoy solid throat hits. The Nord Pod mouthpiece continues the duck-billed design, but it also has a great improvement, with a lip curve on it. This mouthpiece perfectly fits to your mouth and offers a better user experience.

Box Contents:

1 x Nord Replacement 3mL Pod
1 x 0.6 ohm Mesh Coil for Sub-Ohm Vaping
1 x 1.4 ohm Regular Coil for MTL Vaping

item.title: Smok Nord Pod (No Coils)
item.dc:creator: James
item.content:encoded:
The SMOK Nord Replacement Cartridge is designed for SMOK Nord Kit and comes equipped with a 3ml E-liquid capacity and features an E-liquid window for checking E-liquid level. When you need to refill it, you just pull out the rubber plug and inject your favorite Cloud Chemistry e-Liquid. It is compatible with 0.6ohm mesh coil and 1.4ohm regular coil. The mesh coil will produce massive clouds and great flavor. The 1.4ohm coil is designed for MTL vaping. The pod adopts improved duck-billed mouthpiece, which comes with a lip curve on it, it is perfect fit your mouth and offer better experience.

Pod Features:

  • Capacity: 3ml
  • Used With SMOK Nord Coils (e.g. 0.6 Mesh / 1.0 Ceramic / 1.4 Regular)
  • Fit for: SMOK Nord Pod System Kit

Package Contents:

  • 1x SMOK Nord Replacement Pod -1PK

item.title: Smok RPM40 Nord Pod
item.dc:creator: James
item.content:encoded:
The SMOK RPM Replacement Pods are compatible with the Nord Series coils. They can be distinguished by the rubber plugs. 1x Plug being red and 1x plug being black. And the corresponding text that states ‘RPM’ or ‘Nord’ on the plugs them selves. The RPM40 pods offer a huge E-Juice capacity of 4.3ml! The square housing for the pods is expertly crafted and has stood up to SMOKs rigorous testing methods to ensure absolute perfection. Innovation keeps changing the vaping experience!

Pod Features:

  • E-Juice Capacity: 4.3ml
  • Coil Compatibility: Nord

Package Contents:

  • 1x SMOK RPM40 Replacement Pod Cartridge

Compatible with RPM 40W Pod Kits

item.title: Smok RPM40 RPM Pod
item.dc:creator: James
item.content:encoded:
The SMOK RPM Replacement Pods are compatible with the RPM40 Series coils. They can be distinguished by the rubber plugs. 1x Plug being red and 1x plug being black. And the corresponding text that states ‘RPM’ or ‘Nord’ on the plugs them selves. The RPM40 pods offer a huge E-Juice capacity of 4.3ml! The square housing for the pods is expertly crafted and has stood up to SMOKs rigorous testing methods to ensure absolute perfection. Innovation keeps changing the vaping experience!

Pod Features:

  • E-Juice Capacity: 4.3ml
  • Coil Compatibility: RPM

Package Contents:

  • 1x SMOK RPM40 Replacement Pod Cartridge

Compatible with RPM 40W Pod Kits
